file_insights.changes: Integrated i18n translation hook (useTranslation) and replaced all hardcoded strings with translation keys (t('pages.login.*'))
Added appName and appSubtitle keys under pages.login section to support LoginPage branding
Added Hebrew translations for appName and appSubtitle (appSubtitle: 'פלטפורמת ניהול פרויקטים בנייה')
Created comprehensive 274-line locale file with structured translation keys across common, buttons, pages, header, sidebar, errors, and validation sections
Updated task tracking from spec '017-1-2-create-equipmentapprovalsubmission-model' to '033-transalte-all-the-product-to-hebrew', session 8→9, completed subtasks 7→7 of 28 total

patterns_discovered.description: Consistent use of useTranslation hook from react-i18next library with namespace 'pages.login' for hierarchical key organization
Nested JSON structure using dot notation (pages.login.email, pages.login.password) for organized and scalable localization
Systematic extraction of UI strings from React component, replacing hardcoded text with t() function calls for full i18n support
Maintaining matching key structure across en.json and he.json while preserving brand name (BuilderOps) across both languages

gotchas_discovered.description: Git diff output was truncated (showing '... (truncated, 20338 chars total)') preventing full visibility of all LoginPage.tsx changes
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Review complete file separately to verify all string replacements were made

gotchas_discovered.description: Switched from spec '017-1-2-create-equipmentapprovalsubmission-model' (8 subtasks) to '033-transalte-all-the-product-to-hebrew' (28 subtasks), indicating larger scope translation project
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Ensure consistent translation approach across all 28 subtasks

gotchas_discovered.description: Created comprehensive en.json in both main location (frontend/src/i18n/locales/) and task-specific worktree (033-transalte-all-the-product-to-hebrew/), potential duplication risk
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Maintain single source of truth for locale files; consider consolidating or establishing sync mechanism

gotchas_discovered.description: appName 'BuilderOps' kept in English across both language files rather than translating, requires explicit decision confirmation
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Document decision to keep brand name constant across all languages

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully extracted all LoginPage UI strings and integrated them into i18n translation framework with full Hebrew support
key_accomplishments: Integrated react-i18next hooks into LoginPage component
Extracted 11+ login-related translation keys from hardcoded strings
Created structured JSON locale files with 274 translation keys across 10 sections
Provided Hebrew translations for all LoginPage strings
Maintained consistent naming conventions (camelCase for keys, nested hierarchy)

recommendations.recommendation: Verify LoginPage.tsx truncated diff section to confirm all string replacements completed and no hardcoded text remains
recommendations.rationale: Truncated git diff prevents full validation of implementation completeness

recommendations.recommendation: Consolidate dual locale files (main vs. worktree) to establish single source of truth for translations
recommendations.rationale: Prevents translation divergence and reduces maintenance burden across 27 remaining subtasks

recommendations.recommendation: Implement automated i18n key validation to prevent usage of missing translation keys
recommendations.rationale: As translation scope expands to 28 subtasks, risk of missing keys increases significantly

recommendations.recommendation: Create translation key naming standard documentation for consistency across all components
recommendations.rationale: Current structure is sound but should be formalized before applying to remaining 27 subtasks

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding context comments in locale JSON files for ambiguous translation terms
recommendations.rationale: Would aid future translators and improve translation consistency, especially for Hebrew RTL context
